item.title: HUB3: Smagen af det italienske gadekøkken – PIZZA | Kartoffel, marscarpone, rosmarin og citronskal | Salami finnochio, portobello og løg | Kalkun pepperoni og rød peberfrugt | Zucchini, portobello og løg | Soltørrede tomater, rød peberfrugt og rød pesto | | Week 34 | Monday | Satay chicken with creamy peanut sauce, flavored with ginger and garlic. | Served with brown rice and topped with pak choy, bean sprouts, carrot and CORIANDER, BUT ONLY FOR THOSE WHO WANT. | Satay tofu and edamame beans with creamy peanut sauce, flavored with ginger and garlic. | Tuesday | Bolognese a la ragu made with braised beef chuck and lovely rich vegetables. | Served with whole grain spaghetti, parmesan, oregano and basil. | Vegetable bolognese made with beluga lentils and lovely rich vegetables. | Wednesday | Burger with fried zucchini steaks, cucumber relish, lettuce, red onion and burnt lemon mayo. | Served with French fries and chipotle mayo. | Cake of the day | Courgetti cake with brown butter and coffee creme | Thursday | Classic Danish “Forloren hare” pork meatloaf wrapped in bacon with brown gravy, boiled potatoes, cucumber salad and curly parsley. | Vegetable meatloaf with mushrooms, brown gravy, boiled potatoes, cucumber salad and curly parsley. | Friday | The taste of Italian street food – PIZZA | Potato, marscarpone, rosemary and lemon zest | Salami finnochio, portobello and onion | Turkey pepperoni and red pepper | Zucchini, portobello and onion | Sun-dried tomatoes, red pepper and red pesto | Vegetar | Vegetarian
